summary: Beagles are small hunting dogs with an incredible sense of smell. They are excellent at tracking and are often used to detect things like illegal food imports. These friendly dogs make great pets and are known for their good temperaments. The modern beagle breed originated in Britain in the 1830s, combining several older breeds. Beagles have been popular in art, literature, and media for centuries, dating back to the Elizabethan era.
title: Beagle
